com.mrdimka.hammercore.gui

Class GuiCentered

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.client.gui.Gui
      • net.minecraft.client.gui.GuiScreen
        • com.mrdimka.hammercore.gui.GuiCentered
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.minecraft.client.gui.GuiYesNoCallback
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GuiBook, GuiBookCategory, GuiBookEntry, GuiCalculator, GuiTesseract

    public abstract class GuiCentered
extends net.minecraft.client.gui.GuiScreen
    Similar to GuiContainer but doesn't have container. This gets rid of JEI but still provides function to make GUI centered.
